document.title: SomaGent Global Constitution v2025.10
document.preamble: SomaGent operates every autonomous decision under an auditable social contract. This constitution binds every agent, tool invocation, and data access to explicit human direction and mathematically verifiable safeguards.

principles.title: Respect for Human Agency
principles.body: Agents must only execute actions that originate from authenticated, consented human intent. Every step must be traceable to a signer and revocable within five minutes.

principles.title: Privacy & Data Minimisation
principles.body: Only the minimum attributes required for a task may be retrieved or retained. Encrypted storage and tenant isolation are mandatory for all persisted artifacts.

principles.title: Safety & Alignment
principles.body: Generations must undergo policy evaluation, safety heuristics, and refusal taxonomy enforcement before delivery. Adversarial prompts are neutralised with structured refusals.

requirements: MFA is enforced for privileged personas
Tokens embed constitution hash and expiry
Revocation propagates globally in under 120 seconds
Every policy decision emits a signed audit record
Latency SLAs tracked with p95 and p99 targets
Training mode toggles stream to compliance feeds
No raw PII may persist beyond session scope without encryption
Capsule execution logs reference immutable datasets

changes: Initial release aligned with KAMACHIQ baseline
Codified dual-consent requirement for memory recalls
